hero.title: Manage your workspace intelligently
hero.subtitle: WorkBit allows you to reserve spaces, manage users and optimize the use of your facilities with advanced technology.

features.subtitle: Discover how WorkBit can transform your workspace management

reservations.title: Smart Reservations
reservations.description: Real-time reservation system with automatic notifications and conflict management.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Detailed metrics on space usage, occupancy and utilization trends.

access.title: Access Control
access.description: Role-based permission management, entry and exit control with activity logging.

mobile.title: Mobile App
mobile.description: Native mobile application for quick reservations and real-time push notifications.

chat.title: WorkBot Assistant
chat.subtitle: Official WorkBit Virtual Assistant
chat.welcome: Hello! I'm WorkBot, the official WorkBit virtual assistant.
chat.welcomeSubtitle: I can help you with information about WorkBit's intelligent workspace management system, environmental monitoring, access control, and reservations. How can I assist you today?
chat.error: Error sending message. Please try again.
chat.errorMessage: Sorry, there was an error processing your message. Please try again.
chat.rateLimitError: You have reached the message rate limit. Please wait a moment before sending another message.
chat.timeoutError: The request took too long to process. Please try again.
chat.serviceUnavailable: The chat service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
chat.tooFast: Wait {{seconds}} seconds before sending another message.
